landing.headline: Write Your Story,
landing.description: Create powerful life narratives with AI assistance. Write in any Indian language, generate audiobooks, and order beautiful printed copies of your stories.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need to Tell Your Story
landing.featuresSubtitle: From writing to publishing to printing - we've got you covered
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Four simple steps to create and share your story with the world
landing.testimonialsSubtitle: Join thousands who have transformed their experiences into lasting legacies
landing.pricingTitle: Free to Write, Affordable to Print
landing.pricingSubtitle: Start creating for free. Pay only when you want a printed book.
landing.ctaDescription: Join thousands of storytellers documenting their journeys, sharing wisdom, and creating lasting legacies for generations to come.

features.aiWritingDesc: Get intelligent suggestions, grammar improvements, and content expansion in multiple Indian languages as you write.
features.voiceInputDesc: Speak your story naturally with high-accuracy speech-to-text supporting all major Indian languages.
features.publishShareDesc: Share your stories with the world. Publish online with beautiful formatting and easy social media sharing.
features.audioNarrationDesc: Convert your stories to natural-sounding audio in multiple languages. Listen anywhere with chapter navigation.
features.aiImagesDesc: Enhance your stories with contextual AI-generated images that bring your narrative to life.
features.createEbooksDesc: Transform your stories into professionally formatted eBooks with customizable layouts and styling.
features.printOnDemandDesc: Order beautiful hardcover or paperback books. Perfect for gifting or keeping as treasured memories.
features.multiLanguageDesc: Write in Hindi, Bengali, Tamil, Telugu, Marathi, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, and more.

howItWorks.step1Desc: Create your account in seconds. No credit card required to start writing.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Select life story or creative writing. Start with what resonates with you.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Use voice input, AI suggestions, and smart editing tools to craft your story.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Share online, create audiobooks, or order printed copies. Your story, your way.

testimonials.testimonial1Quote: Writing my life story helped me process decades of experiences. The AI assistance made it so easy to express thoughts I struggled to put into words.
testimonials.testimonial2Quote: The voice input feature is incredible! I could tell my grandmother's stories in Tamil, and the platform transcribed everything perfectly.
testimonials.testimonial3Quote: As a creative writer, I love how the AI helps me overcome writer's block. The audio narration feature is absolutely game-changing!

pricing.pricingNote: All prices in Indian Rupees (₹). Shipping charges may apply for print orders.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's an overview of your stories.
dashboard.noStoriesDescription: Start a new story to begin your journey.

likedStories.title: Liked Stories
likedStories.visitPage: Visit the {link} page to see all stories you've liked.

expertSessions.title: Expert Sessions
expertSessions.noSessionsDescription: Complete a life story to request an expert consultation.

lifeStory.title: Change Your Story, Change Your Life
lifeStory.description: Document your life journey through 7 meaningful stages with AI guidance

creativeStory.title: Write Your Own Story
creativeStory.description: Create engaging fictional content with AI-powered writing assistance
